output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, it contains "🅒🅜🅕 - ➊➊➋➍⓿⓿➊➍" at the end of the post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, it specifically mentions George Simion, who is position #2 on the presidential candidates list.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with an estimated reach of 100,001-500,000 people and already has 8,000-8,999 impressions.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, the post explicitly calls for people to "ieșim masiv la vot și să votam George Simion," which is a direct call to vote for a specific candidate.
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content. It contains a direct call to action to vote for a specific candidate.
6. Personal opinion: While it expresses an opinion about the "system," it goes beyond personal expression by actively calling for votes for a specific candidate.
The post includes several elements that classify it as electoral propaganda: - Direct mention of a presidential candidate - Explicit call to vote - Use of CMF number - Paid distribution - Clear electoral messaging

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains explicit call to vote for a specific presidential candidate - Uses official campaign markings (CMF number) - Is distributed as paid advertising - Has clear electoral messaging - Attempts to influence voting behavior
conclusion.message-for-police: Senatorul Sorin Cristian Alic, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale, într-o postare sponsorizată pe Facebook (ID: 497335456648147) distribuită după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea conține un îndemn explicit de a vota candidatul George Simion, folosește număr CMF (🅒🅜🅕 - ➊➊➋➍⓿⓿➊➍), și are un evident caracter de propagandă electorală prin mesajul "să ieșim masiv la vot și să votam George Simion", reprezentând o încercare directă de a influența comportamentul electoral al cetățenilor în perioada în care propaganda electorală este interzisă prin lege.
